title: ActionAid Bangladesh
subtitle:
ActionAid Bangladesh has been implementing a women-centred emergency response to support the Rohingya refugees through establishing Women Safe Spaces (WSS). 
As part of it, 1466 Rohingya women and adolescent received sewing training through the intervention of AAB. pic.twitter.com/rPPHYa8nXJ
